channel.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I had left Runescape and SCAR for quite some time, 265 days according to the last time I had logged in RS. As I logged on earlier today, I also tried to find the Kaitnieks board, only to find them missing... After a bit of research I ended up here. I haven't taken much time to read yet, and wondered if someone cared to explain, or point me to the right place to catch up on the news a bit.
Why did the Kainieks site close down? Is Kaitnieks still around? What was this Aryan thing that is now "dead"? A client? A proxy? Something else altogether? What's the state of the art? Still SCAR? Something else? Has SCAR been updated much? Any major things Jagex has done lately?
That sort of stuff.
Thanks in advance,
Darkshado

item.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
item.dc:creator: @John2.0 John2.0
item.description:
@John2.0 wrote:

philip_l_g:

i just spent 9:21 minutes watching people drawn on paper but i feel sorry for you living with those rejects and with your bleeding anus …

yea… pretty much. I can’t believe i spent a brief moment of my life watching that lol.

Read full topic

yes you live under a rock i live under a leaf its great it got electricity gas water porn(aka google) computer for google oh and a few doors

item.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

Why did the Kainieks site close down?
Don’t listen to Pwnd, it wasen’t Aryan, or maybe it was, but not a big deal.
The reason he closed the forums, it was because he was getting a daughter, and he was stating to get more busy, and jagex were starting problems with him, so he quit everything. He would stand and fight, and probably win if he didn’t have a daughter and werent so busy.
Is Kaitnieks still around?
No, he left. But he is still online on MSN, I talk to him sometimes
What was this Aryan thing that is now “dead”? A client? A proxy? Something else altogether?
A public bot that used to work like 2 weeks ago but then stopped working.
What’s the state of the art? Still SCAR? Something else?
SCAR and private bots, and your hand (mouse)
Has SCAR been updated much?
no ( or look Pwnd post)
Any major things Jagex has done lately?
lots. randoms etc

Read full topic
item.source: I feel like I've been living under a rock

item.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Aryan was almost a flawless bot but it eventually became buggy. Aryan rocked runescape, boosted its economy however you can see at lease 5 bots at rimmington mine and 20 at ess mines. It was huge, you could see bots everywhere. But using aryan you would have got banned within a week.This caused jagex ot introduce many things, they even made colour changes every loading time while playing rs. Recently jagex updated their entire engine, this killed aryan and you can barely see any bots. The update also included new randoms which SCAR wasnt able to cope with. Right now all we have is SRL. Also after kaitnieks went down many communities arose, many of them having wars with ddosing. Fagex and rscn both have gone.

Read full topic
item.source: I feel like I've been living under a rock

item.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
item.dc:creator: @Darkshado Darkshado
item.description:
@Darkshado wrote:

Thanks Pwnd,

What did Aryan do to piss everyone off? (I can understand Jagex, but everyone?)
I was around on Kaitniek’s board when 2.03 was released.
What’s the situation with includes? I haven’t seen any mention of Squig and SI, what replaced them?
What’s SRL?
I’ll take a look around for info on the new randoms, I’ve seen the “Sandwich Lady” teleport someone but that’s about it.

Goodbye,

Darkshado

Read full topic
item.source: I feel like I've been living under a rock

item.title: I feel like I've been living under a rock
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Why did the Kainieks site close down?
-Aryan
Is Kaitnieks still around?
-Yeah, he had a kid. He’s left us, prartially.
What was this Aryan thing that is now “dead”? A client? A proxy? Something else altogether?
-A public bot that pissed everyone, especially Jagex, off.
What’s the state of the art? Still SCAR? Something else?
-SCAR, like always. And private bots.
Has SCAR been updated much?
-If you mised SCAR 2.03, I guess so. Go here for scar stuff: http://82.92.130.193/forums/
Any major things Jagex has done lately?
-Randoms, Updated thier client engine (Reason why aryan is dead), and that’s about it.

Read full topic
